line.comment: * Build a new service ship every 15 minutes if there is less than $maxServiceShips in the sector.
* Note: TLs are built through Mayhem.Signal.Corruption.Docked.

sval.val: Build a new service ship every 15 minutes if there is less than $maxServiceShips in the sector.
Note: TLs are built through Mayhem.Signal.Corruption.Docked.
